title: Design Classics Lighting Schoolhouse Farm Style Bathroom Light Bronze White Opal Milk Frosted Glass 4 Light 31.625 Inch Length
description: Neuvelle bronze finish bathroom vanity light with Roseway schoolhouse style white opal glass. Takes four 60-watt medium base frosted light bulbs (not included). Suitable for installation in dry and damp locations. This bathroom light can be installed with the glass facing down only. 120 volts line voltage. UL / CUL certified. 9.125 in x 31.625 in x 7.75 in.
